column3: Expressed in billions of national currency units. Expenditure-based GDP is total final expenditures at purchasers' prices (including the f.o.b. value of exports of goods and services), less the f.o.b. value of imports of goods and services. [SNA 1993]

Source: National Statistics Office Latest actual data: 2023 National accounts manual used: System of National Accounts (SNA) 2008 GDP valuation: Market prices Reporting in calendar year: Yes Start/end months of reporting year: January/December Base year: 2017. Data rebased to 2017 Chain-weighted: Yes, from 1980 Primary domestic currency: Canadian dollar Data last updated: 03/2024
